title: Donald's better self
creator_credit: Jack King, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Donald Duck has two sides to his character. On the one hand, his good self strives to do the right thing, but his bad self usually wins. Donald sleeps late in the morning, and it takes his better self to make him dress and start off the school. On the way to school his bad self entices him to play truant.
